<JD_START>
Job Title: Vice President – Lending Analytics(Hybrid)

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Job Id: 24739875

The Vice President – Lending Analytics will be a part of the Lending Analytics team within the Banking Lead Finance Officer (LFO) group and will be responsible for driving analytics and thought leadership around Lending related areas to support the Banking business with advisory, budgeting and business planning, as well as the achievements of strategic goals.

Responsibilities:

Hands on analyses on actuals and forward-looking business performance to diagnose, understand and communicate key drivers and trends with leadership in businesses and finance.Drive analytics around cross-product economics and design methodologies to appropriately reflect cross-selling value between lending products and other segments of Citi.Drive the creation and design of user friendly and nimble Lending Analytics Dashboards to drive business decisions.Provide ad hoc analyses on an array of matters needed to support management with advisory and strategic decision.Analyses of lending and credit performance in collaboration with other key stakeholders across functions/businesses.Engagement: Form and cultivate partnerships with key stakeholders across Business, Finance, and other relevant functional areas to generate adding value analytics and provide decision support.

Qualifications:

6 years of relevant experience.Strong project management skills.Proficient computer skills with a focus on Microsoft Office applications (MS Excel and MS Power Point) and data analyses skill are highly valued.Proficiency with Tableau preferred but not required.

Skills and competencies:

Demonstrated strength in detailed financial analysis.Integrity, maturity, and positive professional attitude.Excellent organizational and project management skills.Track record of success in delivering high quality work in a fast paced and dynamic environment.Excellent interpersonal skills necessary to deal with colleagues at all levels across Citi.

Citi also offers paid time off packages, including planned time off (vacation), unplanned time off (sick leave), and paid holidays. For additional information regarding Citi employee benefits, please visit citibenefits.com. Available offerings may vary by jurisdiction, job level, and date of hire.
